name: ProofOfHumanity
description: ProofOfHumanity This contract is a curated registry for people. The users are identified by their address and can be added or removed through the request-challenge protocol. In order to challenge a registration request the challenger must provide one of the four reasons. New registration requests firstly should gain sufficient amount of vouches from other registered users and only after that they can be accepted or challenged. The users who vouched for submission that lost the challenge with the reason Duplicate or DoesNotExist would be penalized with optional fine or ban period. NOTE: This contract trusts that the Arbitrator is honest and will not reenter or modify its costs during a call. The arbitrator must support appeal period.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

parameterDecorators.name: access
parameterDecorators.description: TRUE if the Watcher was given permissions, FALSE if permissions were removed.

parameterDecorators.name: domain
parameterDecorators.description: the remote domain of the Home contract for the Replica.

parameterDecorators.name: watcher
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Watcher.

functionDecorators.name: addSubmission
functionDecorators.description: Make a request to add a new entry to the list. Paying the full deposit right away is not required as it can be crowdfunded later.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: addSubmissionManually
functionDecorators.description: Allows the governor to directly add new submissions to the list as a part of the seeding event.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionIDs
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of newly added submissions.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: The array of evidence links for each submission.

functionDecorators.name: addVouch
functionDecorators.description: Vouch for the submission. Note that the event spam is not an issue as it will be handled by the UI.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission to vouch for.

functionDecorators.name: challengeRequest
functionDecorators.description: Challenge the submission's request. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which request to challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: The reason to challenge the request. Left empty for removal requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _duplicateID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of a supposed duplicate submission. Ignored if the reason is not Duplicate.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI. Ignored if not provided.

functionDecorators.name: changeArbitrator
functionDecorators.description: Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes that may be raised in the next requests. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal period and not reenter.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitrator
parameterDecorators.description: The new trusted arbitrator to be used in the next requests.

parameterDecorators.name: _arbitratorExtraData
parameterDecorators.description: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

functionDecorators.name: changeDurations
functionDecorators.description: Change the duration of the submission, renewal and challenge periods.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of the time the submission is considered registered.

parameterDecorators.name: _renewalPeriodDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new value that defines the duration of submission's renewal period.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengePeriodDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new duration of the challenge period. It should be lower than the time for a dispute.

functionDecorators.name: changeGovernor
functionDecorators.description: Change the governor of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _governor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the new governor.

functionDecorators.name: changeLoserStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the party that lost the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _loserStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeMetaEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Update the meta evidence used for disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _registrationMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The meta evidence to be used for future registration request disputes.

parameterDecorators.name: _clearingMetaEvidence
parameterDecorators.description: The meta evidence to be used for future clearing request disputes.

functionDecorators.name: changeRequiredNumberOfVouches
functionDecorators.description: Change the number of vouches required for the request to pass to the pending state.

parameterDecorators.name: _requiredNumberOfVouches
parameterDecorators.description: The new required number of vouches.

functionDecorators.name: changeSharedStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by parties when there is no winner or loser (e.g. when the arbitrator refused to rule).

parameterDecorators.name: _sharedStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: changeStateToPending
functionDecorators.description: Change submission's state from Vouching to PendingRegistration if all conditions are met.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which status to change.

parameterDecorators.name: _vouches
parameterDecorators.description: Array of users whose vouches to count.

parameterDecorators.name: _signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Array of EIP-712 signatures of struct IsHumanVoucher (optional).

parameterDecorators.name: _expirationTimestamps
parameterDecorators.description: Array of expiration timestamps for each signature (optional). struct IsHumanVoucher { address vouchedSubmission; uint256 voucherExpirationTimestamp; }.

functionDecorators.name: changeSubmissionBaseDeposit
functionDecorators.description: Change the base amount required as a deposit to make a request for a submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionBaseDeposit
parameterDecorators.description: The new base amount of wei required to make a new request.

functionDecorators.name: changeWinnerStakeMultiplier
functionDecorators.description: Change the proportion of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake by the winner of the previous round.

parameterDecorators.name: _winnerStakeMultiplier
parameterDecorators.description: Multiplier of arbitration fees that must be paid as fee stake. In basis points.

functionDecorators.name: checkRequestDuplicates
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the duplicate address has been used in challenging the request or not.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission to check.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to check.

parameterDecorators.name: _duplicateID
parameterDecorators.description: The duplicate to check.

functionDecorators.name: executeRequest
functionDecorators.description: Execute a request if the challenge period passed and no one challenged the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission with the request to execute.

functionDecorators.name: fundAppeal
functionDecorators.description: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which request to fund.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The index of a dispute, created for the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _side
parameterDecorators.description: The recipient of the contribution.

functionDecorators.name: fundSubmission
functionDecorators.description: Fund the requester's deposit. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which ongoing request to fund.

functionDecorators.name: getArbitratorDataListCount
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of times the arbitrator data was updated.

functionDecorators.name: getChallengeInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the information of a particular challenge of the request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the queried submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The challenge to query.

functionDecorators.name: getContributions
functionDecorators.description: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of a given challenge of a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: the challenge to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _contributor
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contributor.

functionDecorators.name: getNumberOfVouches
functionDecorators.description: Gets the number of vouches of a particular request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the queried submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to query.

functionDecorators.name: getRequestInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets information of a request of a submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the queried submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to be queried.

functionDecorators.name: getRoundInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets the information of a round of a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the queried submission.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The challenge to query.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round to query.

functionDecorators.name: getSubmissionInfo
functionDecorators.description: Returns the information of the submission. Includes length of requests array.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the queried submission.

functionDecorators.name: isRegistered
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the submission is registered and not expired.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission.

functionDecorators.name: processVouches
functionDecorators.description: Processes vouches of the resolved request, so vouchings of users who vouched for it can be used in other submissions. Penalizes users who vouched for bad submissions.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which vouches to iterate.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the request which vouches to iterate.

parameterDecorators.name: _iterations
parameterDecorators.description: The number of iterations to go through.

functionDecorators.name: reapplySubmission
functionDecorators.description: Make a request to refresh a submissionDuration. Paying the full deposit right away is not required as it can be crowdfunded later. Note that the user can reapply even when current submissionDuration has not expired, but only after the start of renewal period.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: removeSubmission
functionDecorators.description: Make a request to remove a submission from the list. Requires full deposit. Accepts enough ETH to cover the deposit, reimburses the rest. Note that this request can't be made after the renewal period started to avoid spam leading to submission's expiration.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission to remove.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: removeSubmissionManually
functionDecorators.description: Allows the governor to directly remove a registered entry from the list as a part of the seeding event.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of a submission to remove.

functionDecorators.name: removeVouch
functionDecorators.description: Remove the submission's vouch that has been added earlier. Note that the event spam is not an issue as it will be handled by the UI.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission to remove vouch from.

functionDecorators.name: rule
functionDecorators.description: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Accounts for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _ruling
parameterDecorators.description: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refused to arbitrate".

functionDecorators.name: submitEvidence
functionDecorators.description: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission which the evidence is related to.

parameterDecorators.name: _evidence
parameterDecorators.description: A link to an evidence using its URI.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFeesAndRewards
functionDecorators.description: Reimburses contributions if no disputes were raised. If a dispute was raised, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportionally to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: The address that made contributions to a request.

parameterDecorators.name: _submissionID
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the submission with the request from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestID
parameterDecorators.description: The request from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _challengeID
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the challenge from which to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: _round
parameterDecorators.description: The round from which to withdraw.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawSubmission
functionDecorators.description: Allows to withdraw a mistakenly added submission while it's still in a vouching state.
